attributes.action: Have income tax at lower levels or zero for older people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The younger Generation should be taxed at 33% which was the norm years and should apply anyone who is working.
those who have retired at 50-60 pay 15% 60-70 pay 10% and older ones pay zero rated tax nil inother words, pay more tax whilst being younger not older
